issue.title: proposal: x/crypto/ssh: support Diffie-Hellman Group Exchange from RFC 4419

labels.name: NeedsFix
labels.description: The path to resolution is known, but the work has not been done.

labels.name: Proposal-Crypto
labels.description: Proposal related to crypto packages or other security issues

milestone.title: Unreleased
milestone.description: Issues that do not affect released Go code and binaries.

issue.body: A request for support of the diffie-hellman-group-exchange-sha1 key exchange algorithm was made on golang-nuts. This is supported by openssh 7.2 along with diffie-hellman-group-exchange-sha256, both of which are defined by RFC 4419.

body:
It looks like ""diffie-hellman-group-exchange-sha256" isn't supported by the [go ssh library](https://godoc.org/golang.org/x/crypto/ssh)

I see you found the upstream issue!

I don't know whether `diffie-hellman-group-exchange-sha256` is secure or not.  According to [the github crypto deprecation notice](https://githubengineering.com/crypto-deprecation-notice/) they are adding support for `diffie-hellman-group-exchange-sha256` so it can't be too terrible.
I need support for [diffie-hellman-group-exchange-sha256]. Any idea when can this be added?
@salmanwaseem007 There is some movement in https://github.com/golang/go/issues/17230 so maybe this will be added "soon-ish".

@fuyi @ncw see here for an example how to opt-in for `diffie-hellman-group-exchange-sha256`: 
https://github.com/golang/crypto/blob/master/ssh/test/session_test.go#L432-L434
Does one of you want to send a pull request implementing this? Does it need to be optional?

issue.title: sftp: include more ciphers with use_insecure_cipher

repository.name: rclone
repository.description: "rsync for cloud storage" - Google Drive, S3, Dropbox, Backblaze B2, One Drive, Swift, Hubic, Wasabi, Google Cloud Storage, Azure Blob, Azure Files, Yandex Files

issue.body:
#### What is the purpose of this change?
Include more cyphers when using option `use_insecure_cipher`: `aes192-cbc`, `aes256-cbc`, and `3des-cbc`.

#### Was the change discussed in an issue or in the forum before?
This option was introduced in #1810, and here I'm adding a couple more ciphers to the list, which are also still out there being used.

#### Checklist

- [x] I have read the [contribution guidelines](https://github.com/rclone/rclone/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#submitting-a-pull-request).
- [x] I have added tests for all changes in this PR if appropriate.
- [x] I have added documentation for the changes if appropriate.
- [x] All commit messages are in [house style](https://github.com/rclone/rclone/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#commit-messages).
- [x] I'm done, this Pull Request is ready for review :-)
